amendment.description: To authorize parity for defense and nondefense spending pursuant to the Bipartisan Budget Act of 2015.

action.text: Cloture on amendment SA 4549 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 55. Record Vote Number: 95.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 4549 presented in Senate.

Amendment SA 4549 proposed by Senator Reed to Amendment SA 4229. (consideration: CR S3525; text: CR S3525) To authorize parity for defense and nondefense spending pursuant to the Bipartisan Budget Act of 2015.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Cloture on amendment SA 4549 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 55. Record Vote Number: 95.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4549 proposed by Senator Reed to Amendment SA 4229.
